channel.title: Carpentries on Fernando Garcia
channel.description: Recent content in Carpentries on Fernando Garcia

item.title: First activity with Carpentries
item.description: A few weeks ago I joined The Carpentries Latin America. The Carpentries is a community whose mission is to teach basic programming and data science skills to researchers around the world. The Carpentries Latin America is a group that works to extend the initiative of The Carpentries throughout the countries of this region. Â I have joined the team of Spanish translators; a team dedicated to translating and maintaining The Carpentries classes in Spanish.
